Car
Class SpeedJournyRiskView

java.lang.Object
  Car.SpeedJournyRiskView

public class SpeedJournyRiskView
extends java.lang.Object

The class manage displaying the journy and speed statistics based on all journys or for a specific journy.

Author:
Suha

Constructor Detail

SpeedJournyRiskView

SpeedJournyRiskView(driverMidlet dm)
initialize the class variables and fetch the speed and the journys date from the record store and finally call journycalculation() and speedcalculation() to calculate the statistics.

Parameters:
dm - reference from the midlet class
Method Detail

speedcalculation

void speedcalculation()
calculate speed statistics over all days,per day and per journy.

journycalculation

void journycalculation()
calculate journy statistics over all journys, per day and per journy.

JournyView

void JournyView(int c,
                int d,
                int m,
                int y)
Display journey's statistics in the screen either over all journeys or per day or per journey.

Parameters:
c - if c=0 then journey's statistics over all journys will be displayed, if c=1 journey's statistics per day will be displayed,if c=2 then journey's statistics per journy will displayed.
d - the user spesified day of month.
m - the user spesified month.
y - the user spesified year.

speedView

void speedView(int choice,
               int d,
               int m,
               int y)
Display speed's statistics in the screen either over all journeys or per day or per journey.

Parameters:
choice - if choice=0 then speed's statistics over all journys will be displayed, if choice=1 speed's statistics per day will be displayed,if choice=2 then speed's statistics per journy will displayed.
d - the user spesified day of month.
m - the user spesified month.
y - the user spesified year.

riskView

void riskView(int choice,
              int d,
              int m,
              int y)
Display risk's statistics in the screen either over all journeys or per day or per journey.

Parameters:
choice - if choice=0 then risk's statistics over all journys will be displayed, if choice=1 risk's statistics per day will be displayed,if choice=2 then risk's statistics per journy will displayed.
d - the user spesified day of month.
m - the user spesified month.
y - the user spesified year.
